actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide survivors' benefits for death in the performance of duty by Federal protective officers or nonuniformed special police employed by the General Services Administration.

summary.text: Amends the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to extend public safety officer death benefit coverage to Federal protective officers or nonuniformed special police employed by the General Services Administration.

titles.title: A bill to provide survivors' benefits for death in the performance of duty by Federal protective officers or nonuniformed special police employed by the General Services Administration.
